name: Jgl Diff - A Tyler1 tribute
description:
This is a fangame I made for Tyler1 as a tribute for his climb through the jungle. 

I know it's not perfect, i'm using this project as an opportunity to better my dev skills as it is my first "complete" game. don't hesitate to tell me what you think, or if you can find any bugs !

Code and GameDesign by Opesanec

Art by Dezalopie

Music by Abstraction : https://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com/
